channel.title: Rune-Evo V3 (yea, again) SLAYER PROBLEM
channel.description:
Heyo, didn't find anything about this via search :(
So whenever I finish a task and return to Kuradal, she says "You still have x0 Infernal Mages left" or something like that. And when I kill them, "You have finished your task" text pops up...
Sry for bad english and stuff...

item.title: Rune-Evo V3 (yea, again) SLAYER PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @Newb_Chris Newb Chris
item.description:
@Newb_Chris wrote:

Have you compiled it in a IDE hobor?
The standard compiler doesn’t work too well

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo V3 (yea, again) SLAYER PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @hobor hobor
item.description:
@hobor wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:2, topic:539739”]Let me get this clear, when you are told your task is finished and go to the slayer master he tells you, “you have 0 … left”? If so you will to search for that string (probably the first half, ie “you still have x”, since the variable name may be hard to guess!) and then read through the method. There will be a method like getNewTask() somewhere, so do a figure check, if the task amount left is 0 then make him give you a new task.

Pseudo-code

[code=java]// slayer master dialogue
Task task = player.getTask();

if (task.getAmount() == 0) {
player.setTask(Slayer.getNewTask());
} else {
// show dialogue - “you have x [npc] left”;
}[/code][/quote]

Yep, I did it like that, compiled and restarted the server, but the slayer master still says “You have x0 … left”

I even deleted the whole dialogue and it still keeps saying it :S

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evo V3 (yea, again) SLAYER PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Let me get this clear, when you are told your task is finished and go to the slayer master he tells you, “you have 0 … left”? If so you will to search for that string (probably the first half, ie “you still have x”, since the variable name may be hard to guess!) and then read through the method. There will be a method like getNewTask() somewhere, so do a figure check, if the task amount left is 0 then make him give you a new task.

Pseudo-code

[code=java]// slayer master dialogue
Task task = player.getTask();

if (task.getAmount() == 0) {
player.setTask(Slayer.getNewTask());
} else {
// show dialogue - “you have x [npc] left”;
}[/code]

Read full topic
